data.name: labelFolder.Help
data.value: Select a folder from which you want to add images.

data.name: labelThumbFilter.Help
data.value: Pre-defined regular expression filters to match thumbail filenames. Suffix / prefix values are 'small', 'prev', 'preview', 'thumb', 'thumbnail' and 'tmb'. Separators are upderscore '_' or dash '-'.

data.name: labelCustomThumbFilter.Help
data.value: Custom regular expression to match thumbnail filenames.
